channel.title: Hat item to go with dg cape
channel.description:
My current outfit is
-artisian top/bottom/gloves/shoes -dg cape -not going to use ammys as I find them tacky 90% of the time
but I need a good hat. I don't find the artisian hat to really fit the outfit.
I have tried
-the queen crown thingy -dg hood ( doesn't blend right with top )

item.title: Hat item to go with dg cape
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Kidpaparoach:

Your taking aesthetics in this game a bit too seriously kaysie.

Related:

Read full topic
item.source: Hat item to go with dg cape

item.title: Hat item to go with dg cape
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:24, topic:466617”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=583273.msg4156190#msg4156190 date=1352703481]
assuming your talking about irl O_o.
Well what I used to wear was the tropical body n skirt[pink ofc], steads, torva gloves, sara whisper[looks decent tbh], recoloured sol[yellow, its brighter], mages book/arma buckler, tokhaar-kal(fire cape looks good too), hear-no-evil hat(the banana hat with a monkey xD). A lot of the time I’d wear no weapon and shield slot though.
[/quote]

That sure is an odd outfit for a Male to wear in real life.[/quote]
Haha noo, this was my bank standing outfit where I basically picked random nice looking shizz out of my bank and put it on. I never purposely bought anything just for looks exl the recolour but I have far too many points.

Read full topic
item.source: Hat item to go with dg cape

Well what I used to wear was the tropical body n skirt[pink ofc], steads, torva gloves, sara whisper[looks decent tbh], recoloured sol[yellow, its brighter], mages book/arma buckler, tokhaar-kal(fire cape looks good too), hear-no-evil hat(the banana hat with a monkey xD). item.source: Hat item to go with dg cape

item.title: Hat item to go with dg cape
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:16, topic:466617”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=583273.msg4154466#msg4154466 date=1352603158]

[quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=583273.msg4154027#msg4154027 date=1352588418]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=583273.msg4154022#msg4154022 date=1352588363]

Brown Naval Hat
[/quote]I have black

you have any idea how hard it is to find a team for that game these days? :s

A Progress Hat from the Mage Training Minigame.
[/quote]no thanks but thanks for contrib :eek:

I can see my suggestions aren’t welcome here.
[/quote]it has nothing to do with you at all, the progress hat in general is just tacky and is needing a graphical update

I know, I was just kidding. I like it because you can speak to it when you’re bored. It’s not much of a conversationalist though.[/quote]Every time I see the damn thing I think "TEN POINTS TO GRYFFINDOR!!

Read full topic

item.title: Hat item to go with dg cape
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:13, topic:466617”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=583273.msg4154329#msg4154329 date=1352598570]

[quote author=Tutorial link=topic=583273.msg4154311#msg4154311 date=1352598155]

Who wears skillcapes anymore?
[/quote]I do considering its one of the rarest untrimmeds.

There is nothing rare about it? It looks bad trimmed, and even worse untrimmed.
[/quote]lol I meant my skillcape, not dungeoneering. I have untrimmed HP.

I would kill myself before I played countless hours of Soul Wars.[/quote]Ew fuck that, I just used every lamp and xp reward i could on HP. Nomad’s Requiem got me ~800k xp, Blood Runs Deep got me 450k, and WGS for me 400k which finished it off. It was also largely from varied training.

Read full topic
